## CREATE\_EVENT\_MUTATION variable

This mutation is used to create an event for the organization. After validating the user and the organization, the mutation creates the event and add event to the user record.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
CREATE_EVENT_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/event_mutations/createEvent.js)
